gov.nist.csd.pm.pap

Class PAP

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nist.csd.pm.pap.PAP

  • public class PAP
extends java.lang.Object
    PAP is the Policy Access Point. The purpose of the PAP is to expose the underlying policy data to the PDP and EPP. It initializes the NGAC backend using the connection properties set through SetConnectionServlet. This servlet can be access via ../config.jsp upon starting the server.The PAP also stores the in memory graph that will be used for decision making.

      • reinitialize

        public void reinitialize()
                  throws PMException
        Reinitialize the PAP. Set up the NGAC backend. This is primarily used when loading a configuration. Loading a configuration makes changes to the database but not the in memory graph. So, the in-memory graph needs to get the updated graph from the database.
        Throws:
        PMException - If there is an error initializing the PAP.

      • init

        public static void init(java.util.Properties props)
                 throws PMException
        Initialize the PAP with the given properties
        Parameters:
        props - The server properties to initalize the PAP with.
        Throws:
        PMException - If there is an error initializing the PAP with the new properties.
